languages.text: This bloodthirsty creature focuses its attention on those who are {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}hunted{/g}. As long as there are 3 or more such creatures in combat, each of them gains the {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}ties of the brood{/g} effect. If there are two or less of them, whenever one of those creatures' wounds drop below 50% of its maximum wounds, it immediately runs away and hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.translation_comment: focuses its attention - probably we should find a proper synonyn meaning something like "hunts", "haunts", "trails" etc.
languages.original_text: Это кровожадное существо сосредотачивается на целях с {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}меткой охотника{/g}. Пока в бою присутствует 3 или больше таких существ, каждое из них обладает эффектом {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}стайный хищник{/g}. Если их 2 или меньше, то, как только здоровье существа опускается ниже 50% от максимального, оно немедленно убегает и прячется на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This bloodthirsty creature focuses its attention on those who are {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}hunted{/g}. As long as there are 3 or more such creatures in combat, each of them gains the {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}ties of the brood{/g} effect. If there are two or less of them, whenever one of those creatures' wounds drop below 50% of its maximum wounds, it immediately runs away and hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

This bloodthirsty creature focuses its attention on those who are {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}hunted{/g}. As long as there are 3 or more such creatures in combat, each of them gains the {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}ties of the brood{/g} effect. If there are two or less of them, whenever one of those creatures' wounds drop below 50% of its maximum wounds, it immediately runs away and hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

This bloodthirsty creature hunts for {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} but hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} every time {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is dealt to it. If 2 or more creatures of the same kind are adjacent to it, the creature becomes fearless and stops hiding.

This bloodthirsty creature hunts for {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} but hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} every time {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is dealt to it. If 2 or more creatures of the same kind are adjacent to it, the creature becomes fearless and stops hiding.

This bloodthirsty creature focuses its attention on those who are {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}hunted{/g}. As long as there are 3 or more such creatures in combat, each of them gains the {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}ties of the brood{/g} effect. If there are two or less of them, whenever that creature's wounds drop below 50% of its maximum wounds, it immediately runs away and hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Если их 2 или меньше, то, как только здоровье существа опускается ниже 50% от максимального, оно немедленно убегает и прячется на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Это кровожадное существо сосредотачивается на целях с {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}меткой охотника{/g}. Пока в бою присутствует 3 или больше таких существ, каждое из них обладает эффектом {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}стайный хищник{/g}. Если их 2 или меньше, то, как только здоровье существа опускается ниже 50% от максимального, оно немедленно убегает и прячется на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

Это кровожадное существо сосредотачивается на целях с {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}меткой охотника{/g}. Пока в бою присутствует 3 или больше таких существ, каждое из них обладает эффектом {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}стайный хищник{/g}. Если их 2 или меньше, то, как только здоровье существа опускается ниже 50% от максимального, оно немедленно убегает и прячется на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: この血に飢えた生物は{g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}狩られる{/g}者にその注意を集中させる。戦闘中にそのような生物が3体以上いる場合に限り、それぞれ{g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}巣族の絆{/g}効果を獲得する。この生物が2体以下の場合、いずれかの生物の傷が最大値の50％未満になった場合、即座に逃げ出し、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間隠れる。
languages.original_text: This bloodthirsty creature focuses its attention on those who are {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}hunted{/g}. As long as there are 3 or more such creatures in combat, each of them gains the {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}ties of the brood{/g} effect. If there are two or less of them, whenever one of those creatures' wounds drop below 50% of its maximum wounds, it immediately runs away and hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この血に飢えた生物は{g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}狩られる{/g}者にその注意を集中させる。戦闘中にそのような生物が3体以上いる場合に限り、それぞれ{g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}巣族の絆{/g}効果を獲得する。この生物が2体以下の場合、いずれかの生物の傷が最大値の50％未満になった場合、即座に逃げ出し、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間隠れる。

languages.text: 这种嗜血的怪物会集中攻击处于{g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}遭到追杀{/g}的目标身上。如果战斗中至少存在3只同名生物，则所有同名生物都会获得{g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}虫群纽带{/g}效果。如果同名生物的数量低于3只，则每当同名生物的生命值降至最大生命值的50%以下时，此生物都会立刻逃跑，躲藏一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: This bloodthirsty creature focuses its attention on those who are {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}hunted{/g}. As long as there are 3 or more such creatures in combat, each of them gains the {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}ties of the brood{/g} effect. If there are two or less of them, whenever one of those creatures' wounds drop below 50% of its maximum wounds, it immediately runs away and hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 这种嗜血的怪物会集中攻击处于{g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}遭到追杀{/g}的目标身上。如果战斗中至少存在3只同名生物，则所有同名生物都会获得{g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}虫群纽带{/g}效果。如果同名生物的数量低于3只，则每当同名生物的生命值降至最大生命值的50%以下时，此生物都会立刻逃跑，躲藏一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Esta criatura sanguinaria centra su atención en sus {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}presas{/g}. Mientras haya 3 o más de ellas en combate, cada una recibe el efecto {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}lazos de la progenie{/g}. Si hay dos o menos de ellas, cada vez que las heridas de una de esas criaturas se reducen por debajo del 50 % de las máximas, huye y se esconde de inmediato durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: This bloodthirsty creature focuses its attention on those who are {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}hunted{/g}. As long as there are 3 or more such creatures in combat, each of them gains the {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}ties of the brood{/g} effect. If there are two or less of them, whenever one of those creatures' wounds drop below 50% of its maximum wounds, it immediately runs away and hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura sanguinaria centra su atención en sus {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}presas{/g}. Mientras haya 3 o más de ellas en combate, cada una recibe el efecto {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}lazos de la progenie{/g}. Si hay dos o menos de ellas, cada vez que las heridas de una de esas criaturas se reducen por debajo del 50 % de las máximas, huye y se esconde de inmediato durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: Diese blutrünstige Kreatur konzentriert sich auf {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}gejagte{/g} Ziele. Befinden sich 3 oder mehr entsprechende Kreaturen im Kampf, werden diese mit {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}Bande der Rotte{/g} belegt. Wenn es 2 oder weniger Kreaturen sind und die Wunden einer dieser Kreaturen unter 50 % ihrer maximalen Wunden sinken, ergreift sie sofort die Flucht und versteckt sich 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang.
languages.original_text: This bloodthirsty creature focuses its attention on those who are {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}hunted{/g}. As long as there are 3 or more such creatures in combat, each of them gains the {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}ties of the brood{/g} effect. If there are two or less of them, whenever one of those creatures' wounds drop below 50% of its maximum wounds, it immediately runs away and hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese blutrünstige Kreatur konzentriert sich auf {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}gejagte{/g} Ziele. Befinden sich 3 oder mehr entsprechende Kreaturen im Kampf, werden diese mit {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}Bande der Rotte{/g} belegt. Wenn es 2 oder weniger Kreaturen sind und die Wunden einer dieser Kreaturen unter 50 % ihrer maximalen Wunden sinken, ergreift sie sofort die Flucht und versteckt sich 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang.

languages.text: Cette créature assoiffée de sang se concentre sur l'une des {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}proies{/g}. Tant qu'au moins 3 de ces créatures participent au combat, elles bénéficient toutes de l'effet {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}Liens avec le couvain{/g}. S'il n'en reste que 2 ou moins, dès que la réserve de blessures de l'une de ces créatures tombe sous 50 % de ses blessures maximales, elle s'enfuit et se cache pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: This bloodthirsty creature focuses its attention on those who are {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}hunted{/g}. As long as there are 3 or more such creatures in combat, each of them gains the {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}ties of the brood{/g} effect. If there are two or less of them, whenever one of those creatures' wounds drop below 50% of its maximum wounds, it immediately runs away and hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature assoiffée de sang se concentre sur l'une des {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}proies{/g}. Tant qu'au moins 3 de ces créatures participent au combat, elles bénéficient toutes de l'effet {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}Liens avec le couvain{/g}. S'il n'en reste que 2 ou moins, dès que la réserve de blessures de l'une de ces créatures tombe sous 50 % de ses blessures maximales, elle s'enfuit et se cache pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: This bloodthirsty creature seeks those who are {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}Hunted{/g} but hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} every time it loses more than 50% Wounds. If 3 creatures of the same kind are present in combat, the creature receives {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}Ties of the Brood{/g} and never hides.

traits.locale_text: This bloodthirsty creature seeks those who are {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}Hunted{/g} but hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} every time it loses more than 50% Wounds. If 3 creatures of the same kind are present in combat, the creature receives {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}Ties of the Brood{/g} and never hides.

languages.text: Bu kana susamış yaratık, dikkatini {g|f:f523971c57df443b8d5ad8406a05c69b}şikâra{/g} odaklar. Çatışmada 3 veya daha fazla böyle yaratık olduğu sürece her biri, {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}sürüyle bağ{/g} etkisi kazanır. Bu yaratıklar iki veya daha azlarsa içlerinden birinin sağlığı maksimum sağlık puanının %50'nin altına indiğinde yaratık anında kaçar ve 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} saklanır.

As long as there are 3 or more such creatures in combat, each of them gains the {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}ties of the brood{/g} effect. If there are two or less of them, whenever one of those creatures' wounds drop below 50% of its maximum wounds, it immediately runs away and hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Çatışmada 3 veya daha fazla böyle yaratık olduğu sürece her biri, {g|f:7a726fbb11eb4e189d5cd058c7ff566a}sürüyle bağ{/g} etkisi kazanır. Bu yaratıklar iki veya daha azlarsa içlerinden birinin sağlığı maksimum sağlık puanının %50'nin altına indiğinde yaratık anında kaçar ve 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} saklanır.
